articles.title: "A New Paradigm in Gifting" -- Smart Gardens Emerging as Popular Gifts for Newlyweds and Housewarmings
articles.description: SEOUL, South Korea, Nov. 23, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Housewarming gifts are evolving — instead of traditional potted plants, smart gardens are becoming the new trend. ALLUONE Co., Ltd. has introduced 'Watering Garden,' a next-generation gift item that combines technology with emotional design, gaining attention as a smart lifestyle product that offers both practicality and aesthetic appeal.

articles.title: Meet Pancho, the AI bot fighting food waste at the hotel buffet
articles.description: Spanish hoteliers are turning to technology to avoid fines for tossing out up to 30 per cent of lavish daily spreads
articles.content:
To avoid penalties, some hotels have turned to an unusual solution: Pancho, an artificial intelligence system with an electronic eye, which sits above their kitchen bin.
Pancho looks like a chunky tablet. Trained on more than a million images of buff... [3207 chars]

articles.title: Trump’s big problem is not Epstein - it’s the AI bubble
articles.description: The American economy, and the president’s fortunes, are becoming reliant on one new technology. What happens when the artificial intelligence boom busts?
articles.content:
• Why Americans can’t afford McDonald’s any more
Concerns are growing among Republicans that if things continue this way, the party is on track for a drubbing in next year’s mid-terms. If that comes to pass and they lose the House, administration fig... [9265 chars]

articles.title: India, Australia, and Canada announce trilateral technology and innovation partnership
articles.description: India, Australia, and Canada on Saturday announced a trilateral technology and innovation partnership after Prime Ministers Antony Albanese, Mark Carney and Narendra Modi met on the sidelines of the G20 Summit at Johannesburg in South Africa. | India News
articles.content:
The partnership will boost cooperation in key areas including emerging technologies, clean energy and building resilient supply chains, Modi said after the meeting.
“We are delighted to announce an Australia-Canada-India Technology and Innovation (AC... [3449 chars]

articles.title: PM Modi at G20 Leaders’ Summit: Trilateral tech alliance with Canada and Australia
articles.description: India, Australia, and Canada have joined forces to promote technology and innovation, with a focus on critical and emerging technologies like AI. This partnership will also address green energy and supply chain resilience. The leaders will meet in early 2026 to advance this initiative, and India will host an AI Impact Summit in February 2026.

articles.title: PM Modi announces new trilateral technology and innovation partnership with Australia, Canada
articles.description: JOHANNESBURG, Nov 22 : A new trilateral technology and innovation partnership was announced by Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Saturday after a meeting with his Australian and Canadian counterparts on the sidelines of the G20 Leaders’ Summit here. “We are delighted to announce an Australia-Canada-India Technology and Innovation (ACITI) Partnership today,” Modi said in a social media post after meeting Australian Prime Minister Anthony Albanese and Canada’s Mark Carney. “The initiative will deepen collaboration between democratic partners across three continents […]
articles.content:
JOHANNESBURG, Nov 22 : A new trilateral technology and innovation partnership was announced by Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Saturday after a meeting with his Australian and Canadian counterparts on the sidelines of the G20 Leaders’ Summit here.
“W... [1121 chars]

articles.title: Dr Jitendra addresses Lucknow International meet, asserts India’s capability to lead ‘planetary stewardship’
articles.description: Excelsior Correspondent LUCKNOW, Nov 22: Union Minister of State (Independent Charge) for Science & Technology; Earth Sciences; MoS PMO, Personnel, Public Grievances, Pensions, Atomic Energy and Space, Dr. Jitendra Singh today asserted India’s capability to lead “planetary stewardship” and called for a global coalition to address the pressing challenges of climate change, environmental degradation, emerging technologies, and planetary governance. Addressing the panel discussion on “Climate Justice and Planetary Stewardship: Legal Frameworks for Existential Challenges” at the 26th “International Conference of […]
articles.content:
